description: For sale: $1,198,000. "Prime" SC/Forest Park location. 4 Br 2Ba Near schools,parks,shops with convenient Freeway/Expressway access. Near new Apple facility. Open concept floor plan with seperate dining area. Large b'yard with solar heated swim pool & redwood deck. Double pane windows, re-finished h'wood floors, fireplace in liv rm with cathedral ceiling and freshly painted inside/out. Property to be sold "as is"---Location-Location. Seller may need rentback. All measurements from county records. Open House 7/25-7/26 1pm-4pm.

facts.construction quality: 8.0 provided by the county assessor, this grade is based on a scale that varies by market. for more information, or to update the grade, contact the county assessor's office.

title: Santa Clara Home For Sale
